column1: mRtyu vaQcana upadeSa tArA sADana
column2: @154a # // rgya gar skad du /mri tyu banytsa no pa de sha t'a r'a s'a dha nam / bod skad du / 'chi ba slu ba'i man ngag gi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs // 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: utTAya pUrva saMDyAyAm BU pradeSe manohare
column2: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su // langs nas snga dro'i thun la'o //

column1: mRdu Asana upavizwaH san sva hRdi candra maNxale
column2: bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste // rang gi snying gar zla ba la //

column1: paQcamasya praTamam tu dvitIya svara yojitam
column2: lnga pa yi ni dang po la // dbyangs yig gnyis pa rab tu sbyar // zla phyed thig le yang dag ldan //

column1: arDa indu bindu saMyuktam sita raSmi viBUzitam
column2: 'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan //

column1: tasya SuklamayUKEH tu tArAm AkRzya vyomani
column2: de yi 'od zer dkar po yis // mkha' la sgrol ma gdan drangs te //

column1: dvi BujAm sita dehAm tu vara da utpala DAriNIm
column2: phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo la // mchog sbyin dang ni autpal bsnams //

column1: paQca upacAra pUjABiH pUjayitvA tu BaktitaH
column2: nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa yi // gus pa yis ni mchod byas nas //

column1: pApAnAm deSanAm paScAt tatas puNya anumodanam
column2: sdig pa bshags shing phyi nas ni // de nas bsod nams rjes yi rang //

column1: tad pariNAmanAm ca eva tri SaraNa gamanam taTA
column2: de ni yongs su bsngo ba dang // de bzhin gsum la skyabs su 'gro //

column1: om SUnyatA jQAna vajra svaBAva AtmakaH ham iti paWet iti sva para SUnyam vE DyAtvA yogI viDAna vid
column2: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham / zhes pa'i sngags kyis stong par bsgom // rnal 'byor pa yi cho ga yis // chu skyes dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //

column1: sita aravinda maDya sTa candra bimba Asana upari
column2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni // sngon gsungs sa bon las skyes pa'i //

column1: pUrva ukta bIja nizpannAm tArA devIm manoramAm
column2: lha mo sgrol ma yid 'ong ma //

column1: AbadDa vajra paryaFkAm vara da utpala DAriNIm
column2: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas // mchog sbyin ma ni autpal bsnams // ston ka'i zla ba lta bu ni //

column1: Sarad candra kara AkArAm pRzWa candra samASritAm
column2: zla ba'i steng du yang dag bzhugs //

column1: sarva alaFkAra sampUrNAm zoxaSa abda vapuzmatIm
column2: rgyan rnams thams @154b cad yongs su rdzogs // bcu drug lo yi gzugs can ma // sangs rgyas thams cad de yi sras //

column1: sarva saMbudDa tad putra mAtaram kAmarUpaDAm
column2: yum gyur 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma //

column1: DyAtvA arya tArAm hRdaye tasyAH cakram sita dyuti
column2: 'phags ma sgrol ma snying gar bsgom // de yi 'khor lo 'od dkar ldan //

column1: azwa kozWakam azwABiH akzarEH paripUritam
column2: re'u mig brgyad po rnams la ni // yi ge brgyad kyis yongs su bskor // aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa //

column1: oMha avyaQjana maDya sTa sADya nAma Adya nABikam
column2: bsgrub bya'i ming sogs lte ba la // mkhas pas rtse gcig yid kyis ni //

column1: DyAyAt ekAgra cittaH san zaw mAsAn dRXa niScayaH
column2: nges pa brtan pas zla drug bsgom // yi ge bcu yi gsang sngags 'di //

column1: japet aKinna cittaH san mantram enam daSa akzaram
column2: mkhas bas mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas //

column1: oFkAram Aditas dattvA paScAt tAre prayojayet
column2: aom yig dang po sbyin par bya // phyi nas t'a re rab tu sbyar //

column1: tuttAre syAt ture paScAt svAhA antam sArvakarmikaH
column2: tutt'a re yi tu re phyis // sv'a h'a'i mtha' can las kun byed //

column1: brahma indra vizNu candra arka rudra dikpAla manmaTEH
column2: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang // drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang // ba spu'i rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus //

column1: api aKaNxita roma agraH mRtyum jayati mukta vat valI palita dOrBAgya vyADi dAridrya saMkzayaH
column2: 'chi bdag las rgyal grol ba bzhin // skra dkar gnyer ma skal ldan dang // nang dang dbul sogs mdor bsdus na //

column1: siMha Adi azwa mahA BIti duHKa saMdoha nASanam
column2: seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad // sdug bsngal tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms //

column1: ayAcita anna pAna Adi harmya vastra Adi saMgamaH
column2: bskul pa med par zas la sogs // khang bzangs gos la sogs pa thob //

column1: Kaxga aQjana pAda lepa Badra kumBa Adi sidDayaH
column2: ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang // bum pa bzang po la sogs 'grub ; / snyan ngag dang ni smra ba mkhas //

column1: kavi tA vaktR tA meDA prajQA ca ekAnta nirmalA
column2: blo rno shes rab dri ma med // gzhan yang 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams //

column1: anyA ca vAQCitA sidDiH cakrAt asmAt prajAyate
column2: 'khor lo 'di las rab tu 'byung // zhes pa ni /
